name: Music_3635.wav
caption: This song is played on a French horn. There are no other instruments. The first part of this song consists of short bursts of two note pairs played twice followed by one stretched note in an ascending sequence. This is followed by three descending notes. Then two ascending notes are played. This is again followed by three descending notes. It ends with two more ascending notes. There are no voices in this song. This song is an instrumental.
